SEARCH
Package au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.encoding

Interface CodingSchema

public interface CodingSchema
A scheme for representing Coding objects within Spark SQL.

  • Method Details

    • codingStructType

      @Nonnull static StructType codingStructType()
      Creates the Spark StructType for a Coding.
      Returns:
      a StructType that can house a Coding

    • encode

      @Nullable static Row encode(@Nullable Coding coding)
      Encodes a Coding to a Row (Spark SQL compatible type).
      Parameters:
      coding - a coding to encode
      Returns:
      the Row representation of the coding

    • decode

      @Nullable static Coding decode(@Nullable Row row)
      Decodes a Coding from a Row.
      Parameters:
      row - the row to decode
      Returns:
      the resulting Coding

    • encodeList

      @Nullable static List<Row> encodeList(@Nullable List<Coding> codings)
      Encodes a list of Codings to a list of Row objects.
      Parameters:
      codings - a list of codings to encode
      Returns:
      a list of the Row representations of the coding

    • encodeListToArray

      @Nullable static Row[] encodeListToArray(@Nullable List<Coding> codings)
      Encodes a list of Codings to an array of Row objects.
      Parameters:
      codings - a list of codings to encode
      Returns:
      an array of the Row representations of the coding

    • toStruct

      @Nonnull static Column toStruct(@Nonnull Column id, @Nonnull Column system, @Nonnull Column version, @Nonnull Column code, @Nonnull Column display, @Nonnull Column userSelected)
      Creates a Coding struct column from individual field columns.
      Parameters:
      id - the id column
      system - the system column
      version - the version column
      code - the code column
      display - the display column
      userSelected - the userSelected column
      Returns:
      a struct column representing a Coding

    • toLiteralColumn

      @Nonnull static Column toLiteralColumn(@Nullable Coding coding)
      Encodes the coding as a literal column.
      Parameters:
      coding - the Coding to encode.
      Returns:
      the column with the literal representation of the coding.
